# Land Development Services

#### Land Development Services Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Monday through Thursday, 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. and Friday, 9:15 a.m. - 4 p.m. Please note that visitors may not be added to in-person queues past 3:45 p.m. 

__

703-222-0801 TTY 711

LandDevelopmentServices@fairfaxcounty.gov

Fairfax, VA 22035

Bill Hicks

# Public Facilities Manual

The page content has been moved to http://online.encodeplus.com/regs/fairfaxcounty-va-pfm/index.aspx, please wait while we redirect you to that page.

The Public Facilities Manual (PFM) sets forth the guidelines which govern the design of all public facilities which must be constructed to serve new development. It is intended to serve as a technical manual in the effort to implement the requirements of the Subdivision and Zoning ordinances and other applicable chapters of the Code of the County of Fairfax, Virginia (County Code).

The PFM is subject to periodic revisions upon action by the Board of Supervisors. The PFM presented here includes all amendments adopted by the Board through Oct. 20, 2020. If you have any questions or comments regarding the PFM, please contact the Site Code Research and Development Branch at **703-324-1780, TTY 711**.

  
Need Help? Call **703-222-0801** , **TTY 711**.

Monday through Thursday from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. and Friday from 9:15 a.m. to 4 p.m.

  * LDS Permit Library: Access guides to navigate every record type in PLUS.
  * Letters to Industry: Subscribe for LDS announcements, notices, and tech bulletins.
  * Meet With Staff: Find a staff member to help you with the permit process.
